Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet high standards and deliver exceptional value. This item is truly a testament to quality craftsmanship and innovation. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it's worth more than just its face value. I am offering it to you today for $120. I trust this price reflects not only the cost of production but also the superior experience and value it promises to bring into your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
